Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Liberty[ENDCOLOR] is best for civilizations which desire rapid expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Liberty will provide 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in every city and a Scout appears outside of your [ICON_CAPITAL] capital. Unlocks building the Pyramids.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Liberty tree will grant a free Great Person of your choice near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Republic[ENDCOLOR]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food in every City and +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in cities when constructing buildings.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Representation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Each city you found will increase the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of policies by 33% less than normal, libraries now provide +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Also starts a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior Code[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Military Units gain 50% more Experience from Combat and a Great General appers outside of the [ICON_CAPITAL] capital. Great Generals are earned 50% faster.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military Tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when training Melee units and Wounded Military Units inflict 10% more damage than normal.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Professional Army[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold cost of upgrading Military Units reduced by 33% and construct Barracks, Armories, and Military Academies 50% faster. Court Houses now provide +4 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happiness and +4 [ICON_CULTURE] culture.
